name: Dave
message:
The post did originally have details on the decisions I’d made and advice I’d taken but I removed this (along with services I used) as it was getting a bit long and frankly I didn’t think that people would be that interested.
I’m toying with a post on dealing with Recruiters as a contractor (maybe the biggest frustration I have encountered) but not sure whether to finish it or not – it sounds a bit whiny.
I will however look at putting another post together over the coming weeks to give some more details on my choices and experiences.
